channel.title: Looking for a Coder (Highly experienced, Flash would be better)
channel.description:
I'm attempting to pull a private server source off the game Naruto-Arena (http://naruto-arena.com/)
I need a coder (willing to pay, obviously) to pull a blank source of the game. I define a blank source as:
Has the server and clients both running. Has everything set up for development (I.E. It's ready for me to add characters/missions etc.) Isn't absurdly overcomplicated (I can code with RSPS and do a lot of work on servers, I just lack the knowledge on how to build a server for this game from the ground up, considering how unusual it is.) Can be ran into a web browser. Has all aspects of gameplay working (I.E. stuns/damage/effects can be coded in without serious problems)
I'm looking to use this to run a site for an Inuyasha version of the game (to counter-part the Bleach and Naruto versions) and would like this person to stay part of the development team.
However much you want for the job, just let me know. I'll invest in the online server/website/etc. I'll do all the characters and tweaks and updates personally. Any profit made from the "Donations" section of the site will have a fraction sent to you (I'll be splitting it evenly among the development team)
Any questions, Or if you want the job, please PM me or post here.
Also, I probably posted this in the wrong section, so correct me if you will. If you know another site that might have people more in this realm of coding, I'd appreciate it, I know this isn't the best site to go to but I didn't know where else to go ^.^
Thanks everyone.
